name: LiquidationLogic
description: LiquidationLogic library. Implements actions involving management of collateral in the protocol, the main one being the liquidations*.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationCall
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. This event will be emitted every time the implementation gets upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveUsedAsCollateralDisabled
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. This event will be emitted every time the implementation gets upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveUsedAsCollateralEnabled
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. This event will be emitted every time the implementation gets upgraded.
